title:
Exelis Delivers GPS Satellite Simulation Software for US Air Force

[Via Satellite 11-05-13] Exelis ...

attachments.displayName:
Exelis Delivers GPS Satellite Simulation Software for US Air Force

[Via Satellite 11-05-13] Exelis successfully completed factory acceptance testing for the GPS 3 navigation payload simulator software. Developed by Exelis, the software will simulate the behavior of GPS signals in space, which will be used for testing the U.S. Air Force’s next generation GPS ground station known as the operational control system (OCX).

Read More: http://ow.ly/qwFmY 


Photo: GPS 3 Prototype.
Credit: Lockheed Martin
